BackstoryDef.title: clan baker
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked in a large bakery dedicated to baking rockbread. [PAWN_pronoun] often baked hundreds of platters of rockbread in a single day due to how integral it was in the stoneborn diet. However, [PAWN_possessive] true passion was baking pastries. During lulls in rockbread demand, [PAWN_nameDef] created sublime jelly pastries that were wildly popular with [PAWN_possessive] customers.

BackstoryDef.title: clan engineer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] specialized in designing sturdy structures and mechanisms using as few materials as necessary. [PAWN_pronoun] spent most of [PAWN_possessive] time fretting over blueprints, material costs, and stress points, but [PAWN_possessive] results were immaculate. On occasion, [PAWN_nameDef] had to go out and secure building contracts for [PAWN_possessive] clan if work was particularly light.

BackstoryDef.title: clan shepherd
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] tended to the herds of browbull that were owned by [PAWN_possessive] clan. The work was boring, but [PAWN_pronoun] enjoyed the solitude that the job afforded [PAWN_objective]. Due to the fact that the herd was located far away from civilization, [PAWN_nameDef] had to do most things [PAWN_objective]self, including tending to any sick browbull.

BackstoryDef.title: clan merchant
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] traveled on the surface to sell the wares that [PAWN_possessive] clanmates produced. Such a position was not a very prestigious task due to the need to stay above ground, but it was a necessary one, and [PAWN_nameDef] was one of the few stoneborn both skilled enough and willing enough to do it. Though such consistent travel was dangerous, [PAWN_possessive] silver tongue brought in a consistent stream of funds to [PAWN_possessive] clan.

BackstoryDef.title: artificer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a talented craftsman, even amongst the stoneborn. But what truly set [PAWN_objective] apart was [PAWN_possessive] proficiency in various disciplines of crafting. As such, [PAWN_pronoun] had the privilege of having [PAWN_possessive] clan’s elite members as frequent patrons of [PAWN_possessive] work. They commissioned [PAWN_nameDef] for a wide variety of projects, from armaments, to intricate murals carved directly into cave walls, to noble’s clothes, all of which.

BackstoryDef.title: earthcarver
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] hewed the very earth to his design. From hollowing out rooms in the side of a cave to sculpting art from solid rock, [PAWN_pronoun] was adept in all methods of manipulating stone. For the rare occasion where natural stone was not enough, [PAWN_nameDef] also had practice with bricklaying as well.

BackstoryDef.title: clan flesher
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a butcher by trade. [PAWN_pronoun] often slaughtered the animals he was going to prepare, but [PAWN_possessive] main job was to prepare carcasses into sellable cuts of meat. [PAWN_nameDef] used the scraps to make salami, which [PAWN_pronoun] often kept for [PAWN_objective]self.

BackstoryDef.title: insect rearer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] farmed insects for a living. [PAWN_pronoun] herded them, collected insect jelly from their hives, and occasionally sold some of [PAWN_possessive] herd when the population was becoming unmanageable. It was tough work, but [PAWN_nameDef] enjoyed providing food for the stoneborn.

BackstoryDef.title: clan healer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked in a stoneborn medical ward. There, [PAWN_pronoun] learned how to treat all manner of injuries, from respiratory issues caused from ore dust and gas leaks to brutal industrial accidents. But the wounds [PAWN_pronoun] treated the most by far were the ones that were sustained from drunken brawls.

BackstoryDef.title: runesmith
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was trained in the delicate art of runesmithing. Only certain weapons and armor were of high enough quality to be adorned with runes, and [PAWN_pronoun] was one of the individuals that fashioned them. Due to the significance that rune-smithed equipment held to the stoneborn, [PAWN_possessive] services were always in high demand.

BackstoryDef.title: clan chef
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a cook for the stoneborn underhalls. [PAWN_pronoun] baked rockbread, cooked mushrooms, prepared pastries, and brewed alcohol, often on the same day. And then when all the food [PAWN_pronoun] prepared was consumed, [PAWN_pronoun] would repeat the same process the next day. This brutal cooking gauntlet made [PAWN_nameDef] quite skilled at [PAWN_possessive] craft, but it also made [PAWN_objective] quite short-tempered, even for a stoneborn.

BackstoryDef.title: underbanker
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] helped to manage the funds of his clan. [PAWN_possessive] days were filled with counting the silver in the clan vault, parsing through ledgers, and keeping track of the wealth each clan member had.

BackstoryDef.title: goldsmith
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked with a staggering amount of gold and other valuable metals to create various novelties. Silverware, clan crests, and extravagant decorations were [PAWN_possessive] domain, making [PAWN_objective] quite popular with stoneborn nobility.

BackstoryDef.title: jeweler
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] crafted delicate pieces of jewelry from gems and precious metals. [PAWN_possessive] jewelry was in high demand from stoneborn nobility, and [PAWN_pronoun] often had to haggle with them to get a fair price.

BackstoryDef.title: metallurgist
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Rather than forging equipment from metal, [PAWN_nameDef] worked with the very metal itself. [PAWN_pronoun] made sure the smelters were at the correct temperatures and monitored the metal ratios in alloys. On occasion, [PAWN_nameDef] would experiment with the smelting process to see if [PAWN_pronoun] could cut out any inefficiencies, to varying degrees of success.

BackstoryDef.title: forgemaster
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] helped manage the workers in one of the underforges. When [PAWN_pronoun] was not examining and critiquing the output of the smiths, [PAWN_nameDef] was barking orders to the laborers. [PAWN_nameDef] took [PAWN_possessive] position very seriously, and [PAWN_pronoun] ensured everyone under [PAWN_possessive] was working to their fullest extent.

BackstoryDef.title: spore alchemist
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] experimented with various fungi to see what [PAWN_pronoun] could make. On occasion, [PAWN_nameDef] found a mushroom with medicinal properties. But for the most part, [PAWN_pronoun] ended up brewing a lot of mushroom alcohol.

BackstoryDef.title: mineshaft canary
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] interpreted the results of gas-detecting equipment to determine whether mine shafts were safe to mine in or not. Unfortunately for [PAWN_objective], that also meant that [PAWN_pronoun] had to place the equipment in said mine shafts to get readings in the first place. [PAWN_nameDef] has had a few close brushes with death, but [PAWN_pronoun] has also gotten quite good at running away from gas leaks.

BackstoryDef.title: gas giant skimmer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was often stationed in orbit around a local gas giant. [PAWN_possessive] job was to go down to the surface of the planet, harvest gas, fly it back home, fly back to the gas giant, and repeat. [PAWN_nameDef] had to pick up a variety of skills to survive the brutal task [PAWN_pronoun] had, including producing his own food.

BackstoryDef.title: clan crafter
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a dedicated crafter for a stoneborn clan. Rather than working in the underforges, [PAWN_pronoun] manufactured armaments in a private forge to be used solely by [PAWN_possessive] clan. This gave [PAWN_nameDef] connections that most other stoneborn could only dream of.

BackstoryDef.title: gilder
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] enjoyed crafting as much as any other stoneborn, but [PAWN_possessive] true passion was in decorating finished weapons and armor with gold. The process of carefully inlaying gold and making it durable enough to stay on during a battle was an art [PAWN_pronoun] excelled at.

BackstoryDef.title: refinery worker
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a simple laborer in the underforges, mainly tasked to haul metal, clear slag, and refuel machines, among other menial tasks. [PAWN_pronoun] may not have had the most glamorous or prestigious position, but it was a vital task nonetheless. [PAWN_nameDef] became quite experienced in breaking apart slag, and [PAWN_pronoun] even managed to pick up some of the crafting techniques the smiths in the underforges used.

BackstoryDef.title: deep miner
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Every stoneborn knows how to mine, but [PAWN_nameDef] was especially talented at it. [PAWN_possessive] skills with digging far outstripped most of [PAWN_possessive] peers, which is why [PAWN_pronoun] was often selected to go on particularly deep and dangerous mining excursions.

BackstoryDef.title: mushroom farmer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a humble mushroom cultivator in one of the stoneborn’s many underground fungus farms. [PAWN_possessive] waking hours were spent either tending to the mushrooms or maintaining the very soil they grew in, never taking a break for [PAWN_objective]self. [PAWN_nameDef] never complained however, as [PAWN_pronoun] knew how important [PAWN_objective] job was for the survival of the stoneborn.

BackstoryDef.title: weaponsmith
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a smith in the grand stoneborn underforges. While [PAWN_pronoun] received training in all methods of crafting, [PAWN_possessive] true speciality was in crafting the finest armaments for the military. Thanks to extensive practice and experience, [PAWN_nameDef] struck a near perfect balance between quality and quantity with producing weaponry.

BackstoryDef.title: warcleric
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] channeled [PAWN_possessive] faith both on and off the battlefield. Whether residing at home or taking cover from enemy fire, [PAWN_pronoun] could often be heard reciting relevant lines from various holy texts.\n\nNo matter the situation, [PAWN_nameDef]’s devoutness was unyielding to the point where it bolstered the resolve and morale of his compatriots, even if they possessed differing ideals.

BackstoryDef.title: goldguard
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] held the important job of guarding the vault of [PAWN_possessive] clan. Most of [PAWN_possessive] shifts were peaceful, dotted with the rare robbery attempt that [PAWN_pronoun] easily thwarted. While [PAWN_pronoun] stood guard, [PAWN_nameDef] often passed the time by listening to the clan underbankers crunch numbers.

BackstoryDef.title: inquisitor
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a particularly zealous proponent of [PAWN_possessive] faith. [PAWN_pronoun] often traveled around to proselytize to others, and if [PAWN_possessive] not seem sufficiently interested in what [PAWN_pronoun] talking about, [PAWN_nameDef] was more than happy to utilize a more physical approach for conversion.

BackstoryDef.title: gatekeeper
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] guarded the entrances of various places. Most days, [PAWN_pronoun] was positioned near the base entrance, where [PAWN_pronoun] would stand for hours at a time with no excitement besides talking to the people who walked by./nHowever, [PAWN_nameDef] was occasionally moved to more interesting and dangerous locations where [PAWN_pronoun] would get to flex [PAWN_possessive] muscles and crack some heads.

BackstoryDef.title: insect hunter
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was part of an insectoid kill squadron. [PAWN_possessive] job was to enter mineshafts that were infested with insectoids in order to fully clear them out. One of [PAWN_objective] favorite insectoid killing methods was to smoke the insects out with a flamethrower before funneling them into her shotgun-armed squadmates./n[PAWN_nameDef] also enjoyed simply caving insectoid heads in with a large hammer.

BackstoryDef.title: abyssal marine
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] trained to engage his opponents in wide open areas, such as sprawling caverns and ravines. While [PAWN_pronoun] had general combat training, firing upon the enemy where they had trouble reaching [PAWN_objective] was where [PAWN_nameDef] excelled.

BackstoryDef.title: stygial soldier
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was trained to battle in close quarters in tight underground spaces, such as narrow caves and corridors. [PAWN_pronoun] was knowledgeable in conventional combat techniques, but navigating and engaging the enemy in such small spaces was where [PAWN_nameDef] truly felt at home.

BackstoryDef.title: mine sentinel
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was tasked with watching over the mines that stoneborn were actively working in. For the most part, this meant that [PAWN_pronoun] would make sure that the miners were working efficiently while breaking up the occasional brawl. But when insectoids inevitably burrowed into a mineshaft, [PAWN_nameDef] would eliminate them with ruthless efficiency before they caused too much damage.

BackstoryDef.title: ship driller
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] participated in ship-to-ship combat. [PAWN_possessive]’s role was to man a wardrill pod and steer it right into the enemy ship. After breaching the hull, [PAWN_nameDef] would move methodically through the ship to take out any crew that [PAWN_pronoun] could before having to withdraw.

BackstoryDef.title: rune warrior
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] possessed enough influence and combat prowess to be allowed to wield rune-smithed equipment. Such an honor was quite uncommon in stoneborn society due to the quality and price of such items, which made [PAWN_objective] especially stand out from the usual rank-and-file soldiers. A mere glance of [PAWN_nameDef] was enough to inspire fervent bravery in [PAWN_possessive] allies and fear in [PAWN_possessive] foes.

BackstoryDef.title: psyhunter
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] practiced the delicate art of slaying psycasters. Of course, while [PAWN_possessive] natural psychic inertness was helpful, [PAWN_pronoun] was no match for a psycaster in direct combat. Thus, [PAWN_nameDef] hunted down psycasters in long range engagements, as psychic powers were not particularly dangerous when they could not reach [PAWN_possessive].

BackstoryDef.title: firedrake
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a firedrake. [PAWN_possessive] sole purpose was to set things on fire, and [PAWN_pronoun] was quite good at it. [PAWN_nameDef] was fully aware that individuals in [PAWN_possessive] line of work did not possess particularly long lifespans, but [PAWN_pronoun] valued dousing things in flame over [PAWN_possessive] own life.

BackstoryDef.title: firedrake veteran
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a seasoned firedrake. [PAWN_pronoun] somehow managed to survive both enemy fire and [PAWN_possessive] own conflagrations for an extended period of time, though [PAWN_pronoun] had numerous brushes with death. This experience has hardened [PAWN_nameDef]’s resolve, though [PAWN_possessive] love for setting things alight has not been slaked in the slightest.

BackstoryDef.title: slayer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was part of an insectoid slaying strike team. [PAWN_possessive] main job was to escort mining teams that were digging out new mines, as it was nearly guaranteed that they would unearth a wild insectoid nest. When that inevitably occurred, it was [PAWN_nameDef] who dealt with making things safe for the miners by clearing out the bugs and the nests. While [PAWN_pronoun] was not killing insects, [PAWN_pronoun] assisted with creating new mineshafts.

BackstoryDef.title: shalecracker
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef]’s role was to sap through enemy defenses. While all stoneborn have an affinity with mining, [PAWN_pronoun] was adept at doing so under pressure. While mining was [PAWN_possessive] main role, [PAWN_nameDef] was also handy with cracking enemy skulls with a warhammer.

BackstoryDef.title: clan guardian
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] held the important job of guarding the clan hall. From morning to night, [PAWN_possessive] job was solely to make sure that no one caused any trouble, though the worst thing [PAWN_pronoun] had to deal with were rowdy drunks. However, due to [PAWN_possessive] proximity to some of the most powerful stoneborn, [PAWN_pronoun] was able to listen in to very interesting gossip from time to time.

BackstoryDef.title: mess cook
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: While [PAWN_nameDef] was a soldier by trade, [PAWN_pronoun] had a talent for cooking. As [PAWN_pronoun] possessed an abundance of free time, [PAWN_pronoun] decided to help feed [PAWN_possessive] platoon by preparing meals from the meager ingredients available to [PAWN_objective] and making sure the larder was well stocked.

BackstoryDef.title: combat engineer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: While trained in traditional combat, [PAWN_nameDef]’s main job was to quickly assemble buildings to assist [PAWN_possessive] comrades. Such structures ranged from defensive fortifications to siege equipment, and [PAWN_pronoun] often had to build these while under fire. [PAWN_pronoun] was also skilled at dismantling enemy structures in a pinch.

BackstoryDef.title: automaton crafter
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] manufactured machines of war. [PAWN_pronoun] utilized [PAWN_possessive] comprehensive knowledge of warfare to assemble automatons that performed a variety of combat roles, such as medical evacuation vehicles that would automatically attempt to rescue wounded compatriots, or siege weapons that rolled on treads. During times of peace, [PAWN_nameDef] used [PAWN_possessive] knowledge to create more mundane machines, like automated mushroom cultivators.

BackstoryDef.title: aegisbreaker
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a personal guard of an underlord, one of the most powerful individuals in [PAWN_possessive] clan. [PAWN_pronoun] was never permitted to speak while on duty, but the connections that came to [PAWN_objective] due to [PAWN_possessive] proximity to the underlord were numerous. [PAWN_nameDef]’s duties also afforded [PAWN_objective] the privilege of hearing various bits of information, such as clan finances and military strength.

BackstoryDef.title: shroom curator
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] protected the mushroom farms of [PAWN_possessive] clan. While rare, wild insects occasionally burrowed into fields, and it was [PAWN_nameDef]’s job to eliminate them while evacuating mushroom farmers to safety. However, most of [PAWN_possessive] time guarding the fields was spent either tending to the mushroom crop or chatting to the mushroom farmers that worked near [PAWN_objective].

BackstoryDef.title: beastmaster
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] trained all manner of creatures, from megaspiders to molemutts. [PAWN_possessive] main responsibility was to teach animals to fight alongside soldiers in the front lines, though [PAWN_pronoun] also taught some of them to work as guard animals or hunting partners. In [PAWN_possessive] free time, [PAWN_nameDef] hunted wild game to feed [PAWN_possessive] charges.

BackstoryDef.title: battlesmith
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] trained in the arts of artifice to bolster [PAWN_possessive] combat capabilities. While [PAWN_pronoun] made [PAWN_possessive] own weapons and armor and could use them well, where [PAWN_pronoun] excelled was in quickly creating various devices to gain an edge in combat. Even in the middle of battle, [PAWN_objective] could easily assemble lethal traps and jury-rigged turrets in a matter of moments.
